Class CompassMappingXmlSearchableGrailsDomainClassMappingConfigurator

java.lang.Object
  org.codehaus.groovy.grails.plugins.searchable.compass.config.mapping.AbstractSimpleSearchableGrailsDomainClassMappingConfigurator
      org.codehaus.groovy.grails.plugins.searchable.compass.config.mapping.CompassMappingXmlSearchableGrailsDomainClassMappingConfigurator
All Implemented Interfaces:
SearchableGrailsDomainClassMappingConfigurator, org.springframework.context.ResourceLoaderAware, org.springframework.core.Ordered
public class CompassMappingXmlSearchableGrailsDomainClassMappingConfigurator
extends AbstractSimpleSearchableGrailsDomainClassMappingConfigurator
implements SearchableGrailsDomainClassMappingConfigurator, org.springframework.context.ResourceLoaderAware, org.springframework.core.Ordered

Configures Compass with searchable domain classes that have a corresponding Compass mapping XML classpath resource.

Author:
Maurice Nicholson
